transcript_text: I'm sorry, the person you are trying to reach has a voicemail box that has not been set up yet. Please try your call again later. Goodbye.

sentiment_analysis.summary: The customer was unable to reach the intended person, as the voicemail box had not been set up yet, and was advised to try the call again later.

process_improvements: Implement a system to automatically detect unset voicemail boxes and notify the appropriate team to set them up
Create a knowledge base article on the process for setting up new voicemail boxes, and ensure all relevant employees are trained on it
Explore options for an automated call routing system that can direct callers to available agents when the intended recipient is unavailable

strengths: The employee provided a clear and polite explanation for the issue
improvements: The employee could have offered to take a message or provide alternative contact information to help the customer
suggested_phrases: I apologize, but it looks like the voicemail box for the person you're trying to reach hasn't been set up yet. Would you like me to take a message or provide you with an alternative number to try?

follow_up_actions: Notify the team responsible for setting up new voicemail boxes about this issue
Review the call logs to identify any other instances of unset voicemail boxes and address them
Implement a customer follow-up process to ensure the customer's issue was resolved
knowledge_base_updates: Create a FAQ entry on the process for setting up new voicemail boxes and what customers should do if they encounter an unset voicemail

escalation.reason: This was a routine customer inquiry that was handled appropriately, with no need for escalation

call_resolution.problem_statement: The customer was unable to reach the intended person due to an unset up voicemail box.
call_resolution.resolution_details: The employee informed the customer that the voicemail box has not been set up yet and advised them to try the call again later.

missed_best_practices: Asking if there's anything else the customer needs
Providing a timeline for when the voicemail box will be set up
Offering contact information for further assistance
improvement_suggestions: Confirm the customer's understanding of the issue and resolution
Ask the customer if there's anything else they need help with
Provide a timeline for when the voicemail box will be set up
Offer contact information for further assistance if needed
